Recreating PR for issue #6495 and making two small nullable potential issues corrections

Signed-off-by: Gaël L'hopital <gael@lhopital.org>

timeline.bodyText: What is the benefit of the null-check? null is not equal to DHCPPacket.DHCPREQUEST anyway.
timeline.author: J-N-K

timeline.message:
Revert incorrect correction

Signed-off-by: Gaël L'hopital <gael@lhopital.org>

timeline.bodyText:
How can the user reset this counter? I'm thinking of e.g. a network connection problem which takes half a day or so.
Or maybe a setting of configuration.maxTimeouts=0 disables timeouts at all?
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: Disabling the thing is an option no ?
replies.author: clinique

replies.bodyText: Sounds good. But what do you think of the timeout-counter disable?
replies.author: J-N-K
